RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: PhD (2019) and Master (1997) in Education in Education from the State University of Ponta Grossa. Graduated in Science Degree (1987) with Qualification in Mathematics (1989) from the State University of Ponta Grossa. Professor active in Basic Education from 1984 to 2000. She is an adjunct professor (TIDE regime) at the State University of Ponta Grossa - UEPG where she was based in the Department of Teaching Methods and Techniques (Human Sciences, Letters and Arts sector) in the period 1994 to 2016. In 2017 it started to be filled in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics (Exact and Natural Sciences Sector) working in the Supervised Curricular Internship in Mathematics and other pedagogical disciplines that make up the curriculum of the Mathematics Degree Course. Worked in the Normal Higher Course with Interactive Media / UEPG in the theme 'Mathematics, reading and representation of the world' between 2000 - 2003. He served as Head of Department / DEMET between 2008 - 2010. He coordinated the Institutional Scholarship Program for Teaching Initiation / Mathematics Teaching Subproject - EF / PIBID in the period 2010 - 2015. She held the position of Director of the Division of University Extension / PROEX (UEPG) between 2010-2014 and Director of Education / PROGRAD (UEPG) between 2014-2015. She coordinated the Mathematics Education Teacher and Researcher Extension Project: challenges and perspectives in the period 2007-2019, remaining as a supervising teacher in the project until the present day. Areas of interest: Supervised Curricular Internship in the degree; Mathematics Teaching and Learning; University Extension.
